title: Ban for no reason
body: So today I just upgrade me client with the new practice tool and when I finished it it has a 0% download but there's a login session so I tried login my account it when I tried It says that I'm suspended and never in my way up in level 30 I got suspended or get a chatrestrict please help what happened to this?

replies.body:
If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll get you in touch with an account specialist who can give you context on your account's standing.

Let me know if you have troubles submitting your ticket.
